description: This Java class defines an event named ClearAllPinCodesResponseEvent, which models a response event for clearing all PIN codes in a Zigbee device cluster, specifically related to door lock functionality.

classes.name: ClearAllPinCodesResponseEvent
classes.description: A class representing a Zigbee cluster command event for clearing all PIN codes, including construction and payload generation.

methods.name: ClearAllPinCodesResponseEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event with the cluster and status, setting relevant fields and command ID.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Generates and returns the payload byte array containing the status.
